00031 /**
00032  * Init the module
00033  */
00034 void signals_init(void) {
00035 
00036         DEBUG_MSG("DEBUG: signals_init: BEGIN\n");
00037 
00038         // Confine all process signals
00039         //  to one thread: easier management
00040 
00041         /* block all signals */
00042         sigset_t        signal_set;
00043 
00044         sigfillset( &signal_set );
00045         pthread_sigmask( SIG_BLOCK, &signal_set, NULL );
00046 
00047         /* create the signal handling thread */
00048         pthread_create( &__signal_thread, NULL, __signals_handler_thread, NULL );
00049 
00050         DEBUG_MSG("DEBUG: signals_init: END\n");
00051 
00052 }// signal_init

00062 /**
00063  * Signal Handler for the whole process
00064  */
00065 void *__signals_handler_thread(void* params) {
00066 
00067         litm_connection *conn = NULL;
00068         litm_code code;
00069 
00070         // TODO LITM connect error: is there a better way to handle this??
00071         code = litm_connect_ex_wait( &conn, LITM_ID_SIGNALS, 0);
00072         if (LITM_CODE_OK != code)
00073                 DEBUG_LOG(LOG_ERR, "cannot connect to LITM");
00074 
00075         static bus_message shutdown_message;
00076         static bus_message alarm_message;
00077 
00078         shutdown_message.type = MESSAGE_SHUTDOWN;
00079         alarm_message.type    = MESSAGE_TIMER;
00080 
00081         sigset_t signal_set;
00082         int sig, __exit=0;
00083 
00084         for(;;) {
00085                 /* wait for any and all signals */
00086                 sigfillset( &signal_set );
00087                 sigwait( &signal_set, &sig );
00088 
00089                 switch( sig ) {
00090 
00091                 case SIGTERM:
00092                         DEBUG_LOG(LOG_DEBUG, "signals: received SIGTERM");
00093                         // void_cleaner in utils.c
00094                         if (NULL!=conn)
00095                                 litm_send_shutdown( conn, LITM_BUS_SYSTEM, &shutdown_message, &void_cleaner );
00096                         __exit = 1;
00097                         break;
00098 
00099                 case SIGQUIT:
00100                         DEBUG_LOG(LOG_DEBUG, "signals: received SIGQUIT");
00101                         break;
00102 
00103                  case SIGINT:
00104                         DEBUG_LOG(LOG_DEBUG, "signals: received SIGINT");
00105                         break;
00106 
00107                  case SIGVTALRM:
00108                          DEBUG_LOG(LOG_DEBUG, "signals: received SIGVTALRM");
00109                                 if (NULL!=conn)
00110                                         litm_send( conn, LITM_BUS_SYSTEM, &alarm_message, &void_cleaner );
00111                          break;
00112 
00113                  case SIGALRM:
00114                         // TODO generate timer message on litm
00115                         DEBUG_LOG(LOG_DEBUG, "signals: received SIGALRM");
00116                         break;
00117 
00118                 default:
00119                         DEBUG_LOG(LOG_DEBUG, "signals: unsupported signal, sig[%i]", sig);
00120                         break;
00121                 }
00122 
00123                 if (1==__exit) {
00124                         break;
00125                 }
00126         }
00127 
00128         //litm_wait_shutdown();
00129 
00130         DEBUG_LOG( LOG_INFO, "signals: END thread" );
00131 
00132         return (void*)0;
00133 }//signal_handler_thread
